7.ara-name: كتاب الزكاة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Muhammad bin Bash-shar (Al-Abdi) narrated to us, :Muhammad bin Ja'far narrated to us, from Shu'bah, from Amr bin Murrah who said: "I asked Abu Ubaidah bin Abdullah: 'Did you remember anything from Abdullah?' He said, 'No

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي زَكَاةِ الْبَقَرِ .
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Zakat On Cows
